body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Jeptha Bright. Married to Dorcas Helm Bright in Shelby County on September 27, 1855. Father of Charles Bright, William Bright, Jeptha Bright, Georgie Bright, and James Bright. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1860.
